Headline: Temporary Southbound Reroute near Wentworth / 53rd
ShortDescription: Southbound 24 buses are temporarily rerouted via Wentworth/51st/ Princeton/55th/ Wentworth/Over regular route due to police activity near Wentworth / 53rd.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #24  Wentworth buses are temporarily rerouted via Wentworth / 51st / Princeton / 55th / Wentworth / Over the regular route due to police activity near Wentworth / 53rd.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
